title: Hybrid Blackletter/Roman
content:
This cover for Speer's "Inside the Third Reich" looks as precise as a font, but I don't recognize it. Any suggestions as to what it might be. Thanks. Don.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [HybridOfRoman&Backletter.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004819/http:/typophile.com/files/HybridOfRoman&Backletter.jpg) | 64.12 KB |
author: donshottype

comments.content:
It must be **[Romic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004819/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letraset&ffam=Romic%20-%20Medium&fid=11e7fefec075292a20b424797d3f8c96&fsize=60&text=INSIDE%20THE%20THIRD%20REICH&wrap=2)** by Colin Brignall, published by Letraset (1979), also available from Adobe, Linotype, ITC + others

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004819/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")

Many thanks. The lower case also matches.  
Don
